author: mi-hol
body:
@SteveL-MSFT The currently visible milestones and projects are not indicative of pwsh development plans.
I wonder if there is no longer a owner for them?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @mi-hol yes, it's a bit out of date.  I'll get them updated after PSConfAsia this week.

comments.author: mi-hol
comments.body: issue closed but no update as promised :(

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I'll keep this open until it actually gets updated.  My team is still going through planning.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: We are waiting blog post about 7.0 plans and perhaps a meta issue.

title: github milestones and projects are in need of updates
